mapper.insert: INSERT INTO address(address_recipient_name, address_recipient_phone, address, address_default, main_address, address_reference, address_detail, address_postcode, member_id) VALUES ( #{address_recipient_name}, #{address_recipient_phone}, #{address}, 1, #{main_address}, #{address_reference}, #{address_detail}, #{address_postcode}, (select member_id from member where username=#{username}) );
